alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 3:03PM MST until February 12 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Although brief, snow will fall heavy at times with snowfall rates of up to 2 inches per hour. * WHERE...Eastern slopes of the Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Huerfano and Western Las Animas Counties including Trinidad and Walsenburg. * WHEN...From 6 PM MST this evening until 2 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
